title: Upload your expense
description: Please upload your expense receipt and fill in the required details.
step_1.title: Name your expense
step_1.description: Enter a name for your expense.
step_1.placeholder: Enter a name for your expense.
step_2.title: Upload your receipt image
step_2.description: Upload your receipt image in PDF, PNG, JPG, JPEG, or AVIF format.
step_3.title: Enter a description for the expense
step_3.description: Enter a description for the expense.
step_3.placeholder: Enter a description for the expense.
step_4.title: Enter the date of the expense
step_4.description: Enter the date of the expense. The date must be in the past.
step_4.label: Date of the expense
step_5.title: Is it a digital expense?
step_5.description: Select if the expense is digital or not.
step_5.label: This is a digital expense
step_6.title: Categorize the expense
step_6.description: Select the categories and enter the amount for each one.
